doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 30 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 7/22/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 30 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 7/22/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. The AIDS-centered play "The Normal Heart" banned from performing at Washington D.C.'s Kennedy Center after the Supreme Court ruling on the Georgia sodomy laws2. Man sues the San Diego Police Dept. for arresting him at their Gay Pride Parade and forcibly administering the HTLVIII antibody test3. Urvashi Vaid becomes the Information Director of the National Gay and Lesbian Task Force4. Officer court-martialed for refusing to submit to testing for the HTLVIII antibodyCOMMERCIAL: Urban General Warehouse Sale5. Iowa's Democratic Party Convention refuses to change the state constitution to give gays a vote on the central committee6. Andy Humm on courageCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine7. Chicago judge vacates court order for gay fathers to have to take the HTLVIII antibody test before being allowed to have custody of their children8. Introduction of laws for the regulation of "poppers" as a recreational drug9. Ability of men to get pregnant by implanting a fertilized egg in the anusCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp10. Sports Report11. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Second part of the interview with Bruce Patterson and Scott Jordan, discussing relationships as a person with AIDS12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. The Fabulous Follies: Drag star Hurricane Sommers lip-synchs to Patti Labelle's song "Oh" over clips of NYC's Gay Pride ParadeCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" magazine2. Newsweek magazine coverage, discussion of NYC AIDS doctor and homosexual abuse by a Massachusetts college president3. Channel 5's coverage of the Georgia sodomy laws, with clips4. Rate of AIDS in Haiti among straight men and women very highCOMMERCIAL: Body Mate exercise equipment5. Coverage of the rally race between Los Angeles and New York CityCOMMERCIAL: Waterfront Airways6. Coverage of film "The Manhattan Project," starring John Lithgow and Cynthia Nixon 7. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 30 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 7/22/1986]: July 1986
